GenAiFunction.description: This action creates a new QuoteLine and add it to the existing Quote. This action is used to create a new QuoteLine for existing Quote. This action creates a new QuoteLineItem record to the Quote. Before calling this Action, find the 18-digit Product ID based on the Product Name specified by the User using Action QueryRecords. Before calling this Action, find the 18-digit Quote ID based on the Quote Number or Quote Name specified by the User using Action QueryRecords.
